input.sentences: mom and dad just got a fresh house .
and man is it nice and spacious .
weve never had such a huge kitchen .
and the living room could hold huge tvs .
output.sentences: This couple has just gotten married and is touring a new house to buy.
They walk through the house admiring the rooms one by one.
They love the large amount of cabinet space in the kitchen.
The living room is also very large and spacious.
The couple is happy with what they have seen and decide to purchase the house.
